title: And He Had in His Right Hand Seven Stars, and out of His Mouth Went a Sharp Two-Edged Sword (Et il avait dans sa main droit sept étoiles, et de sa bouche sortait une épée aiguë à deux tranchants) from Apocalypse of Saint John (Apocalypse de Saint-Jean)
medium: Lithograph with chine collé from a portfolio of 13 lithographs (12 with chine collé)
credits: Gift of The Ian Woodner Family Collection
